item.title: Team Style Guides and Mind Set
item.description: Been sharing this info with team members a bit lately and want to post it here for reference. Though there is no ONE way to do any of this there are ways that scale better than others. But more importantly having one way as a team to do things can be key to projects from beginning to end (eg the rest of the projects life!) Project Style Guides The Clean Coder by Robert Martin book is a look at being a “Professional” coder and all that comes with it.
